name: 4x4 Monster Truck Racing
description:
Feel the power of the real monster truck car! Make the offroad track burning under your hot wheels, deliver significant load right in time and have fun playing 4x4 Monster Truck Racing!

Fasten your seat belts, get your foot down and prepare to a really high speed! Don’t miss any turn and obstacle! Left your significant trace in a monster truck racing history! Choose one of these brutal offroad monster trucks and burst into this super race! Maneuver between every stone and dirt place, be as mobile as you can and learn the path of the best offroad driver ever!

Mind that you will earn money only if you’ll deliver your goods safe and sound in time, otherwise your game will be over in a second! So be wise and superfast to power-up your super monster truck with nitro, improve your engine and steering wheel, change tires and choose new color! Achieve the high level of synchronization with your car! Do your best and complete every mission on your way! Drive as fast as you can through the dirty rocks of the offroad, reach the finish line in time and deliver your load playing 4x4 Monster Truck Racing!

Use the mini map to navigate and become really skillful offroad car driver! Enjoy this fantastic monster truck car racing fever and have fun! Avoid obstacles, deliver all loads and try not to crash during the race!

4x4 Monster Truck Racing features:
• Realistic offroad car racing simulator
• Wide range of different power-ups for your car
• Interesting tracks and maps
• Master your driving skills!
• Amazing 3D graphics

Let your dreams come true with this amusing monster truck driving simulator! Be at the top of the tournament list and have fun playing 4x4 Monster Truck Racing!
